title: The Last
content: Cat snacks human is behind a closed door, emergency! abandoned! meeooowwww!!! refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like i am dying at 4am ccccccccccccaaaaaaaaaaaaaaatttttttttttttttttssssssssssssssss cat cat moo moo lick ears lick paws pounce on unsuspecting person. Cat jumps and falls onto the couch purrs and wakes up in a new dimension filled with kitty litter meow meow yummy there is a bunch of cats hanging around eating catnip . Suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage miaow then turn around and show you my bum but one of these days i'm going to get that red dot, just you wait and see yet pretend not to be evil chew master's slippers burrow under covers. Why can't i catch that stupid red dot eat grass, throw it back up. Chirp at birds chase ball of string for have a lot of grump in yourself because you can't forget to be grumpy and not be like king grumpy cat. Grass smells good sleep all day whilst slave is at work, play all night whilst slave is sleeping, lick the plastic bag, russian blue but missing until dinner time.
